articles.content:
The Sun, which removed the Dec 16 article from its website three days later at the request of Clarkson, said in its Friday apology that it would also now be removed from its archives.

articles.title: Serial Killer Charles Sobhraj Arrives In France After Release - NDTV
articles.description: French serial killer Charles Sobhraj, responsible for multiple murders in the 1970s across Asia, arrived in France on Saturday after almost 20 years in prison in Nepal.
articles.content:
Charles Sobhraj was arrested in India in 1976 and ultimately spent 21 years in jail here.
